meanings.sent1: The experiment's results showed the provableness of the theory.

meanings.definition: The quality of being able to be demonstrated or verified.
meanings.sent1: The provableness of the evidence convinced the jury.
meanings.sent2: Scientists rely on the provableness of their experiments.
meanings.sent3: The provableness of the magic trick left the audience amazed.
meanings.sent4: The provableness of his loyalty was as solid as a rock.
meanings.sent5: The provableness of her alibi was unquestionable.
